1351380.name: Touch Grass Together
1351380.description:
"Touch Grass!"

After an unknown event which caused everyone to disappear with Just you and your friend remaining. Will you dare to do the unthinkable? Do you dare venture outside and do the unthinkable? To.....touch grass?
This isn't your grandma's grass. This is hardcore foliage caressing!

Features

  • Co-Op so you can touch grass together ğŸŒ¿

  • Big RayTracing and 4K experience ğŸ”¥

Gameplay

Spawn
Experience a Unique First-Person Experience of leaving your home for the first time in years.
Touch grass
Get XP
Unlock New Ways To Touch Grass

Future Plans

This is only the beginning! Stay tuned for upcoming DLC releases and, depending on your feedback, new gameplay feature updates!
